video.title: Cousins on Call
video.synopsis: Real-life cousins and best friends Anthony Carrino and John Colaneri surprise homeowners with huge renovations that will make their dreams come true.

episodes.synopsis: Marlene ditched apartment living for a single-family home to share with her husband and son. But the barren backyard is an eyesore.
episodes.title: A Stacked Deck

episodes.synopsis: After newlyweds Sarah and Joe gutted each room in their new home, they found themselves shell-shocked -- and needing help, big time.
episodes.title: In Too Deep

episodes.synopsis: James's immigrant parents have achieved the American dream. But while they're in Korea visiting family, the Cousins are renovating their home.
episodes.title: American Dream Home

episodes.synopsis: The Cousins head to Mexico to do a surprise beachfront renovation for their client's wife's birthday. The catch? They've only got five days.
episodes.title: Los Primos in Mexico

episodes.synopsis: When Cheryl and Mike discovered a rotted foundation, they called in the Cousins. "Good Morning America" host Lara Spencer also asks the guys for help.
episodes.title: An Inspired Extension

episodes.synopsis: The Cousins transform a dark, unfinished basement into a "boy cave" and central HQ for a 10-year-old cancer survivor's Cancer Stinks Foundation.
episodes.title: Work Hard, Play Harder

episodes.synopsis: The Cousins spring into action when they learn that the house they spent their summers in was damaged during Superstorm Sandy.
episodes.title: From Sandy to Sparkling

episodes.synopsis: While Lamar Odom is away on a trip, Khloe Kardashian Odom brings in the Cousins to transform unused space into a spectacular state-of-the-art theater.
episodes.title: Khloe Surprises Lamar

episodes.synopsis: The Cousins get creative while transforming a couple's basement into the perfect living space for the wife's veteran brother to live in.
episodes.title: Operation Renovation

episodes.synopsis: Tara and Darren need space to escape from the stresses of the day, so Tara calls in the Cousins to transform three rooms into a master suite.
episodes.title: A Suite Surprise

episodes.synopsis: In the wake of Hurricane Sandy, the Cousins work with expectant parents Steve and Michelle, who had moved into their home 45 days before the storm.
episodes.title: New Beginnings

episodes.synopsis: The time and expense of battling cancer put a strain on Aaron's family, preventing much-needed home improvements on a long road to recovery.
episodes.title: Cousins Help a Cancer Survivor
